mapper.insert: insert into city (city_id, province_id, district_id, pei_city_id, city_name) values (#{city_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{district_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pei_city_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select city_id, province_id, district_id, pei_city_id, city_name from city
